column2:
"I knew you were the ARKS to ask!
...What do you mean, it was nothing? That was so amazing that the image of it is burned into my eyeballs!"
"So that's how you fight in the Tundra, huh? I can totally use this!"
"...But how the heck did you spot those ones hiding in the snow?"
"You had a gut feeling? That's wild! But I've got guts to spare, so hearing that makes me feel like I could be a killer like you some day!"
"Alright, I'm gonna get out there and use my gut on all those jerks who think they can hide from me! Thanks for showing me the way!"
